fields.description:
http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/3883245

Use d3 to create charting over time for both patronage and fixes at the repo level. Take all the order events and create a time series of donations over all time.

fields.title: Use gitpatron_repo.md for Repo description.
fields.json_body: {"body": "When a repo owner publishes a repo, if a gitpatron_repo.md exists it should take the content of that file and use it for the repo markdown. fields.title: Create activity feed: Callbacks, Orders, Patronage, Fixes
fields.json_body: {"body": "Create an activity feed that takes all the Callbacks, Orders, Patronage, Fixes and makes a feed that can be used to take action. Each feed item should have one, simple action associated.", "labels": [], "title": "Create activity feed: Callbacks, Orders, Patronage, Fixes", "url": fields.description: Create an activity feed that takes all the Callbacks, Orders, Patronage, Fixes and makes a feed that can be used to take action. Each feed item should have one, simple action associated.

fields.description:
The Oauth2 API doens't really need to be authorized to do "everything" limit the scope to only creating buttons.

https://coinbase.com/docs/api/permissions

fields.title: make auto callback url for buttons
fields.json_body:
{"body": "https://coinbase.com/docs/merchant_tools/payment_buttons

https://coinbase.com/api/doc/1.0/buttons/create.html

button[callback_url] 
optional	
A custom callback URL specific to this button. It will receive the same information that would otherwise be sent to your Instant Payment Notification URL. If you have an Instant Payment Notification URL set on your account, this will be called instead — they will not both be called.

Value: Must be String", "labels": [{"url": "https://api.github.com/repos/claytantor/gitpatron/labels/enhancement", "color": "84b6eb", "name": "enhancement"}], "title": "make auto callback url for fields.description:
https://coinbase.com/docs/merchant_tools/payment_buttons

https://coinbase.com/api/doc/1.0/buttons/create.html

button[callback_url] 
optional	
A custom callback URL specific to this button. It will receive the same information that would otherwise be sent to your Instant Payment Notification URL. If you have an Instant Payment Notification URL set on your account, this will be called instead — they will not both be called.

Value: Must be String

fields.title: Command To Process Callbacks
fields.json_body: {"body": "Create a command that will process callbacks. This is a first step to handling callbacks but will allow us to create fake callbacks in the DB and process those in dev. fields.title: Refresh tokens for coinbase
fields.json_body: {"body": "Tokens are expiring forcing the user to disable the entire coinbase application and start over to get the new token. What should happen is the refresh token should be used to update the auth token required for the button to be generated.", "labels": [{"url": fields.title: All important fields transformed to published repo.
fields.json_body:
{"body": "Many of the important fields that could make the integration more helpful are missing. Examples:

avatar_url
gravatar id
etc.
", "labels": [{"url": "https://api.github.com/repos/claytantor/gitpatron/labels/enhancement", "color": "84b6eb", "name": "enhancement"}], "title": "All important fields transformed to published
